verses.verse: And <WG2532> he entered <WG1525> again <WG3825> into <WG1519> the synagogue <WG4864>; and <WG2532> there was <WG2258> a man <WG444> there <WG1563> who had <WG2192> his hand <WG5495> withered <WG3583>.
And <WG2532> they watched <WG3906> him <WG846>, whether <WG1487> he would heal <WG2323> him <WG846> on the sabbath day <WG4521>; that <WG2443> they might accuse <WG2723> him <WG846>.
And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto the man <WG1519> that had <WG2192> his hand <WG5495> withered <WG3583>, Stand <WG1453> forth <WG444>.

And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Is it lawful <WG1832> on the sabbath day <WG4521> to do good <WG15>, or <WG2228> to do harm <WG2554>? to save <WG4982> a life <WG5590>, or <WG2228> to kill <WG615>? But <WG1161> they held their peace <WG4623>.

And <WG2532> when he had looked round about <WG4017> on them <WG846> with <WG3326> anger <WG3709>, being grieved <WG4818> at <WG1909> the hardening <WG4457> of <WG2588> their <WG846> heart <WG2588>, he saith <WG3004> unto the man <WG444>, Stretch forth <WG1614> thy <WG4675> hand <WG5495>. And <WG2532> he stretched <WG1614> it forth <WG1614>; and <WG2532> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> was restored <WG600>.

And <WG2532> the Pharisees <WG5330> went out <WG1831>, and straightway <WG2112> with <WG3326> the Herodians <WG2265> took <WG4160> counsel <WG4824> against <WG2596> him <WG846>, how <WG3704> they might destroy <WG622> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> with <WG3326> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> withdrew <WG402> to <WG4314> the sea <WG2281>: and <WG2532> a great <WG4183> multitude <WG4128> from <WG575> Galilee <WG1056> followed <WG190>; <WG846> and <WG2532> from <WG575> Judaea <WG2449>,

and <WG2532> from <WG575> Jerusalem <WG2414>, and <WG2532> from <WG575> Idumaea <WG2401>, and <WG2532> beyond <WG4008> the Jordan <WG2446>, and <WG2532> about <WG4012> Tyre <WG5184> and <WG2532> Sidon <WG4605>, a great <WG4183> multitude <WG4128>, hearing <WG191> what great things <WG3745> he did <WG4160>, came <WG2064> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> he spake <WG2036> to <WG3101> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, that <WG2443> a little boat <WG4142> should wait <WG4342> on him <WG846> because of <WG1223> the crowd <WG3793>, lest <WG2443> they should throng <WG2346> him <WG846>:

for <WG1063> he had healed <WG2323> many <WG4183>; insomuch that <WG5620> as many as <WG3745> had <WG2192> plagues <WG3148> pressed upon <WG1968> him <WG846> that they might <WG2443> touch <WG680> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> the unclean <WG169> spirits <WG4151>, whensoever <WG3752> they beheld <WG2334> him <WG846>, fell down before <WG4363> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> cried <WG2896>, saying <WG3004>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG3754>.
And <WG2532> he2008, 4183 charged <WG2008> them <WG846> much that <WG2443> they should <WG5318> not <WG3361> make <WG4160> him <WG846> known <WG5318>.

And <WG2532> he goeth up <WG305> into <WG1519> the mountain <WG3735>, and <WG2532> calleth <WG4341> unto him whom <WG3739> he <WG846> himself would <WG2309>; and <WG2532> they went <WG565> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> he appointed <WG4160> twelve <WG1427>, that <WG2443> they might be <WG5600> with <WG3326> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> that <WG2443> he might send <WG649> them <WG846> forth <WG649> to preach <WG2784>,
and <WG2532> to have <WG2192> authority <WG1849> to cast out <WG1544> demons <WG1140>:
and <WG2532> Simon <WG4613> he <WG2007> surnamed <WG3686> Peter <WG4074>;

and <WG2532> James <WG2385> the <WG3588> son of Zebedee <WG2199>, and <WG2532> John <WG2491> the brother <WG80> of James <WG2385>; and <WG2532> them <WG846> he <WG2007> surnamed <WG3686> Boanerges <WG993>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076>, Sons <WG5207> of thunder <WG1027>:

and <WG2532> Andrew <WG406>, and <WG2532> Philip <WG5376>, and <WG2532> Bartholomew <WG918>, and <WG2532> Matthew <WG3156>, and <WG2532> Thomas <WG2381>, and <WG2532> James <WG2385> the <WG3588> son of Alphaeus <WG256>, and <WG2532> Thaddaeus <WG2280>, and <WG2532> Simon <WG4613> the Cananaean <WG2581>,
and <WG2532> Judas <WG2455> Iscariot <WG2469>, who <WG3739> also <WG2532> betrayed <WG3860> him <WG846>. And <WG2532> he cometh <WG2064> into <WG1519> a house <WG3624>.
And <WG2532> the multitude <WG3793> cometh together <WG4905> again <WG3825>, so that <WG5620> they <WG846> could <WG1410> not <WG3361> so much as <WG3383> eat <WG5315> bread <WG740>.
And <WG2532> when <WG191> his <WG846> friends <WG3844> heard <WG191> it <WG1831>, they went out to lay hold <WG2902> on him <WG846>: for <WG1063> they said <WG3004>, He is beside himself <WG3754>.

And <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122> that <WG3588> came down <WG2597> from <WG575> Jerusalem <WG2414> said <WG3004>, He hath <WG2192> Beelzebub <WG954>, and <WG2532>, By <WG1722> the prince <WG758> of the demons <WG1140> casteth he out <WG1544> the demons <WG3754>.
And <WG2532> he called <WG4341> them <WG846> unto him <WG3004>, and said unto them <WG846> in <WG1722> parables <WG3850>, How <WG4459> can <WG1410> Satan <WG4567> cast out <WG1544> Satan <WG4567>?
And <WG2532> if <WG1437> a kingdom <WG932> be divided <WG3307> against <WG1909> itself <WG1438>, that <WG1565> kingdom <WG932> cannot <WG3756> stand <WG2476>.
And <WG2532> if <WG1437> a house <WG3614> be divided <WG3307> against <WG1909> itself <WG1438>, that <WG1565> house <WG3614> will not <WG3756> be able to stand <WG2476>.

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> Satan <WG4567> hath risen up <WG450> against <WG1909> himself <WG1438>, and <WG2532> is divided <WG3307>, he <WG1410> cannot <WG3756> stand <WG2476>, but <WG235> hath <WG2192> an end <WG5056>.

But no <WG3756> one <WG3762> can <WG1410> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the house <WG3614> of the strong man <WG2478>, and spoil <WG1283> his <WG846> goods <WG4632>, except <WG3361> he <WG1210> first <WG4412> bind <WG1210> the strong man <WG2478>; and <WG2532> then <WG5119> he will spoil <WG1283> his <WG846> house <WG3614>.

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, All <WG3956> their sins <WG265> shall be forgiven <WG863> unto the sons <WG5207> of men <WG444>, and <WG2532> their blasphemies <WG988> wherewith <WG3745> soever <WG302> they shall blaspheme <WG3754>:

but <WG1161> whosoever <WG3739> shall <WG302> blaspheme <WG987> against <WG1519> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> hath <WG2192> never <WG1519> forgiveness <WG859>, but <WG235> is <WG2076> guilty <WG1777> of an eternal <WG166> sin <WG2920>:
because <WG3754> they said <WG3004>, He hath <WG2192> an unclean <WG169> spirit <WG4151>.

And <WG3767> there come <WG2064> his <WG846> mother <WG3384> and <WG2532> his <WG846> brethren <WG80>; and <WG2532>, standing <WG2476> without <WG1854>, they sent <WG649> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, calling <WG5455> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> a multitude <WG3793> was sitting <WG2521> about <WG4012> him <WG846>; and <WG1161> they say <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Behold <WG2400>, thy <WG4675> mother <WG3384> and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> brethren <WG80> without <WG1854> seek <WG2212> for thee <WG4571>.
And <WG2532> he answereth <WG611> them <WG846>, and saith <WG3004>, Who <WG5101> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> mother <WG3384> and <WG2228> my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>?

And <WG2532> looking <WG4017> round <WG2945> on them that sat <WG2521> round about <WG2945> him <WG846>, he saith <WG3004>, Behold <WG1492>, my <WG3450> mother <WG3384> and <WG2532> my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>!
For <WG1063> whosoever <WG302> shall do <WG4160> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316>, the same <WG3778> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> brother <WG80>, and <WG2532> sister <WG79>, and <WG2532> mother <WG3384>.
